text: At least 17 highly qualified teachers of two government schools failed to answer even basic questions posed by Shahid Iqbal Choudhary, the Deputy Commissioner of Udhampur district in J&K. A teacher of science to Class 10 students failed to answer what fossil fuel is, while a biology teacher failed to name the parts of the digestive system.The DC, then directed an education audit of all schools. — PTI
title: Teachers fail basic test
